name: Tempe Goes to Wawa
description:
True story;  This dude wanted a root beer float so bad, he got outta bed at 3 AM and walked to Wawa during quarantine.  Navigate the streets of Orlando and dodge police officers on your way to the best gas station in America. 

  • THREE (3) fully playable rooms!
  • MULTIPLE images!  
  • MEDIOCRE writing! 
  • MUSIC!  (Pretty good!)

Made for DIG 2783.  

CONTROLS:
WASD to move
SPACE to continue text, interact, etc.
G to get a good stretch in!

The OST, made by Gin and Logan, can be found here!
